Comment: Headline is very misleading. He's a Brit and asked if the US would give asylum to Brits over Free Speech issues in the UK.
Author: JustinCayce

Comment: “I have not heard that proposed to the president nor have I spoken to him about that idea, but I certainly can talk to our national security team and see if it’s something the administration would entertain,” she replied.
Author: Sure-Wishbone-4293
